content:
[ ] Any contract language: shell, js, solidity, rust
[ ] Uses Substrate for Polkadot
[ ] L-Comm based
[ ] Comm servers for interpl communic and verification
[ ] Compatible with Edgeware
[ ] Gitcratic (uses GITorrent) is ann with voluntary revelation feature
[ ] IC: actvst mode (init screen: if you need cntrbt git, etc)
title: Librm
